Title: The One Where the Guys Play Basketball and Do the Friends Title Thing
Writer: Anders Holm, Kevin Etten, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story), Sean Clements (story)

Plot: The guys play in an office basketball tourney for a trip to Reno.
